fields.Description: Trade Perpetuals Using Any Collateral Token.

In 2013, Coinmama set out to simplify the process of buying Bitcoin (BTC). A decade on, we have served over 3 million customers in almost every country in the world. Today, Coinmama users can safely purchase Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other top digital assets using a host of secure and convenient payment options including credit card, debit card, and wire transfer. Coinmama believes that the future of finance lies in people having sovereignty over their own money. We’re excited to be at the forefront of the financial revolution. Welcome to our global community!
fields.Notes: Founders: Nimrod Gruber (CEO/COO), Laurence Newman, Ilan Schuster. Seed $2.4M (Aug 2018) from Mindfulness Capital, iAngels. Acquired by Wellfield Technologies (Mar 2022) for $3M cash + 19% equity. At acquisition: $130M annual sales, 3.5M users, 190 countries.

fields.Description: SIRKL is a revolutionary platform designed to transform how crypto communities interact and communicate, leveraging blockchain technology for direct and transparent communication.

Chromia is a blockchain platform, making it easy for people to build decentralized apps in the real world. Its a Layer-1 blockchain that is also an Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) compatible Layer-2 solution for Ethereum and the Binance Smart Chain.

Hard-security blockchain bridge with 95% cold storage vaults. First bridge supporting all common bridging methods with MPC cryptography and hardware isolation. Supports 25+ chains. Flagship product of DcentraLab alongside TokensFarm and Hord.

Web3 intelligence platform built on cyber intelligence technologies. Provides market intelligence to track risks, reputation and health. Real-time monitoring, forensics, and investigation for smart contracts. Raised $8M from Ten Eleven Ventures and JVP. HQ in Be'er Sheva with NY office.

Platform for creating custom Compound-like decentralized lending networks. Risk isolation ensures network independence. $48M+ TVL deployed on BSC, Fantom, Fuse, Moonbeam, Boba. Partners: SpiritSwap, ApeSwap, Fuse Network.
